title: Playing with Scrub experiences
body:
So I had a game today a 2v1 my friend >bronze< invited one of this random >Bronze< friend along so it was a 2v1 mid only to make it fair.. my account is only level 24 no runes. Me>tryn.. Mate>Irelia... Random>Vayne.. 

Game starts 15 min in destroyed them both then the vayne gets butt hurt goes to bot lane. 

Vayne: FUK YOUR MID ONLY
Me: mid only to make it fair since its 2v1
Vayne: I SAID FUK YOUR MID ONLY YOU SHIIIT CUUNT
Me: rofl ? 

Vayne  then proceeds to talk trash about how shiit/bad I am for wrecking them and how good he is and how bad irelia is dragging him down and  thats why he fed 6 kills by himself...  Lol bronze logic is always the best thing ever... 
Overall funny game


Share your Experiences.

replies.body: playing as ahri, and the enemy complains that true damage is the most bs thing in the game (he wasl playing vel'koz)
Pfft you don't know the meaning of playing with scrubs until you've played in low diamond/high plat. Absolute cancer.
